bibl.title: Catalogue of Greek and Latin Papyri and Ostraca in the Possession of the University of Aberdeen.
bibl.seg: Turner Eric G., Catalogue of Greek and Latin Papyri and Ostraca in the Possession of the University of Aberdeen. (Aberdeen University Studies. 116.)
Aberdeen, The University Press, 1939, 8°, xx-116 pp. et V pll.

C.R. par Harold I. Bell, CR 54 (1940) p. 46. - Paul Collart, REG 53 (1940) pp. 142-143; - RPhil. 3e s., 15 (1941) pp. 58-59. - Frederic G. Kenyon, JThS 41 (1940) pp. 86-87. - Bruce M. Metzger, AJP 63 (1942) pp. 483-485. - Claire Préaux, ChrEg 15 (1940) No. 29, pp. 154-159. - Karl Fr.W. Schmidt, PhilWoch 61 (1941) coll. 83-93. - Leopold Wenger, Gnomon 17 (1941) pp. 93-95. - Ulrich Wilcken, ArchPF 14 (1941) pp. 164-167.
